Description 
Welcome to Rosetta Stone Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® v3.4.5, the world's leading software for language learning. Rosetta Stone teaches language naturally, in the same way they learn the language, by connecting words to objects and events around you. 
Native speakers and thousands of real-life images to help you think of the new language from the beginning. 
You select a course based on their learning objectives. 
Understand everyday language through our reading and listening activities based on language proficiency. 
Pronounce words correctly after practicing with our proprietary tool of analysis and speech recognition. 
Speak without texto.Contextual Formation ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ allows you to feel safe and have the clues needed to say the words at the right time. 
Written with correct spelling, progressing gradually from letters to create words and sentences. 
Participate in real conversations. With Milestone activities, gain confidence using speech alone to communicate and get what you need. 
Retain what they learned. Our unique technology ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ Adaptive Recall reinforces language so that you remember on the actual usage. 
With Rosetta Stone, you will read and speak a language immediately. No translation. Without grammar. Rosetta Stone is the fastest way to learn a new language. 
Enjoy the experience of Rosetta Stone. 


System Requirements 
For this version will run at best performance, you need: Windows 2000, XP or Vista, Mac OS X 10.3.9 or higher 
1 GHz or faster processor 
512 RAM 
600 MB of disk space (per level) 
16-bit sound card 
800 x 600 resolution (1024 x 768 recommended) 
For speech reconociemiento micorfono required (USB recommended) 
Installation Instructions 
After having downloaded and unzipped the package ... Here are the installation instructions: 

Rosetta Stone v3.4.5 1.Install through the setup with the same name. 
2.Al finished installing, close any window, but above all, do not upgrade or activate anything. 
3.Enter to the folder that I provide so-called "Medicine." 
4.Copiar the contents of the folder "Medicine" and then paste it into the folder where you installed the program: C: \ Program Files \ Rosetta Stone \ Rosetta Stone Version 3 (by default) 
5.Reiniciar Rosetta Stone program and enjoy the entire course. 

After installation: 
It may be that after having installed and medicine and everything will work fine, and by adding a linguistic package, come and you should fail, then you should go back to perform steps 4 and 5 in order to have everything well. 
COMMENTS: 
It is very possible that you have errors or medicine will not work in the following cases: 


1.Si had an earlier version of Rosetta, I recommend you to uninstall or conflict might be. 
2.Si did not follow my instructions, I am very sure that everything you fail to use the program. 
3.Si not turn off updates and if you gave accept activation. 
4.Si medicine you used an older version or higher than I'm giving you. 
5.Si not read these instructions prior jejejeje.
